noVouchersInfo: Does not currently provide discount codes.
useVouchersSearchFailHeader: You are buying at the best possible price.
useVouchersSearchFailMessage: None of the available discount codes included the products in your basket, so you can continue shopping confident that you currently have the best possible price at
useVouchersSearchErrorMessage: Error, failed to paste code automatically
useVouchersSearchErrorInstructions: Click on the code to copy it and then paste it in your cart.
useVouchersPopupShareHeader: Share the link with your friends
useVouchersPopupShareText: Do you enjoy buykers? Help us grow and send the link to your friends.
useVouchersPopupShareShare: Or share the information on your social media. Thank you!
useVouchersPopupShareMessage: buykers is a browser extension that automatically finds and adds the best discount code to your order. Download now and see for yourself!
useVouchersPopupListVoucherAddInfo: Have you found a code that we don't have? Share it with our community
useVouchersPopupAddFormHeader: Have you found a code we don't have?
useVouchersPopupAddFormPlaceholderCodeDe: e.g. Discount code -15% on first purchase
useVouchersPopupAddFormPlaceholderCodeVa: e.g. 15% on purchases of a minimum of 50 EUR
useVouchersPopupAddFormDateFuture: The date must be in the future
useVouchersPopupAddThankYouText: Your coupon has been sent for verification, it will appear as soon as possible.
useVouchersPopupShopMissingSubHeader: One click and you buy cheaper. See how easy it is.
useVouchersPopupShopMissingText1: 1. Shop as usual, if our icon appears in the browser bar together with a number, this means that the shop offers discount codes.
useVouchersPopupShopMissingText2_1: 2. When you add a product to your cart, a pop-up will appear with information on how many codes are available, just click
useVouchersPopupShopMissingText2_3: and our plugin will find the best coupon for your order.
useVouchersPopupShopMissingText3: 3. Done! The code has been added, literally one click and you pay less!
useVouchersAlertLoginRequiredHeaderText: In this shop only logged-in users can use discount codes.
useVouchersAlertLoginRequiredInfoText_1: Please login to your account at
useVouchersSearchFailBasketValue:
The value of your products
 in the cart is:
useVouchersSearchRatingText: opinions in the Google Chrome store
GlobalSettings.turnCashbackInfo: Enable the pop-up informing about cashback when you first visit the store's website
GlobalSettings.turnPriceMonitIcon: Enable the icon informing about the possibility of monitoring the price of a given product
GlobalSettings.turnSimilarShopCashbackIn: Turn on the icon informing about the possibility of monitoring the price of a given product
GlobalSettings.turnGiftCardInfo: Enable the pop-up informing about similar gift cards
PrivacySettings.Personal.Desc: Can we collect the following data that may personally identify you:
PrivacySettings.Personal.DescInfo: This data helps us improve our plugin functionality and create services tailored to your needs. If you provide an email address, we may link this data to your account.
PrivacySettings.Personal.DescImpact: If you choose not to allow this data collection, we will not gather or analyze this information. Your choice won't affect the basic functionality of our service.
PrivacySettings.Technical.Desc: Can we collect the following anonymous data about your use of extension:
PrivacySettings.Technical.DescListItem1: Usage data of our plugin features
PrivacySettings.Technical.DescListItem4_: information about the shop where the purchase was made
PrivacySettings.Technical.DescInfo: This anonymous data helps us enhance our coupon services and offers.
PrivacySettings.Technical.DescImpact: If you choose not to allow this anonymous data collection, we will not gather or analyze this information. Your choice won't affect the basic functionality of our plugin.
PrivacySettings.PrivacyPolicy: Full details of the data we collect and what we do with it are available in our
PrivacySettings.AcceptButton: I consent to the data collection
